scenario_text.value:
Minoru. I sense a strange presence coming
from the direction of the shrine.
You mean, like, a “bad guy” vibe?

It’s too soon to say.
Still, best be on our guard.

(No telling what’s out there. We should take
a look, just in case.)

Falcomon senses something over by the shrine.
Doesn’t seem hostile, but...
